title: Sione Tovo
text:
Sione Na'a Pangai Tovo (born 19 July 1988) is a former <a href="Tonga%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Tonga</a> international <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a for the Mascot Juniors RLFC in the A Grade South Sydney Juniors Rugby League . He previously played for the Thirlmere Roosters in the Grade 6 competition, Auburn Warriors in the <a href="Bundaberg%20Red%20Cup">Bundaberg Red Cup</a> and the <a href="Newcastle%20Knights">Newcastle Knights</a> in the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">NRL</a>. 
Playing career.
Born in <a href="Mascot%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Mascot, New South Wales</a>, Tovo played his junior football for the <a href="Mascot%20Juniors">Mascot Jets</a> before being signed by the <a href="South%20Sydney%20Rabbitohs">South Sydney Rabbitohs</a>. He played for the Rabbitohs' <a href="Harold%20Matthews%20Cup">Harold Matthews Cup</a>, <a href="S.%20G.%20Ball%20Cup">S. G. Ball Cup</a> and <a href="Jersey%20Flegg%20Cup">Jersey Flegg Cup</a> teams before being signed by the <a href="Newcastle%20Knights">Newcastle Knights</a>.
Tovo played for the Knights' <a href="National%20Youth%20Competition%20%28rugby%20league%29">NYC</a> team in 2008 and 2009 before moving on to the Knights' <a href="NSW%20Cup">NSW Cup</a> reserve-grade team in 2010.
In Round 23 of the <a href="2009%20NRL%20season">2009 NRL season</a>, Tovo made his <a href="NRL">NRL</a> for the Knights against the <a href="Melbourne%20Storm">Melbourne Storm</a>.
At the end of the <a href="2010%20NRL%20season">2010 NRL season</a>, Tovo was released by the Knights.
In 2011, Tovo joined the <a href="Wests%20Tigers">Wests Tigers</a> <a href="NSW%20Cup">NSW Cup</a> team, the <a href="Balmain%20Tigers%23Club%20today">Balmain Ryde-Eastwood Tigers</a>.
In 2012, Tovo joined the <a href="Auburn%20Warriors">Auburn Warriors</a> in the <a href="Bundaberg%20Red%20Cup">Bundaberg Red Cup</a>.
In 2018, Tovo returned to Mascot Juniors RLFC where he currently plays.
Representative career.
Tonga.
In 2009, Tovo was named in the <a href="Tonga%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Tongan</a> squad for the <a href="2009%20Pacific%20Cup">2009 Pacific Cup</a>
Niue.
In 2017 he represented <a href="Niue%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Niue</a> vs Lebanon.
